TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProvideCustomContentState

summary.span: 由某类实现，该类需要在离开内容之前将自定义状态添加到内容的导航历史记录条目中。

span.span: Implemented by a class that needs to add custom state to the navigation history entry for content before the content is navigated away from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许您将一段自定义状态（实现为自定义 类）与导航历史记录项（用于已离开的内容）相关联。 allows you to associate a piece of custom state, implemented as a custom class, with the navigation history entry for content that has been navigated away from. 还可以通过使用以下方法来关联自定义状态：Custom state can also be associated in this way by using the following: - 调用 **AddBackEntry**：Calling **AddBackEntry**: - - - 。. - 当引发以下事件之一时进行设置：Setting when one of the following events are raised: - - - - 当你通过调用**AddBackEntry**将自定义状态添加到导航历史记录时，你必须实现，否则导航历史记录将无法正常工作; 请考虑以下步骤：You must implement when you add custom state to navigation history by calling **AddBackEntry**, otherwise navigation history will not function correctly; consider the following steps: 1. 调用**AddBackEntry**将自定义状态与当前内容关联。**AddBackEntry** is called to associate a custom state with the current content. 2. 导航历史记录项将向后导航到，并 调用自定义状态的方法，并将状态应用于内容。The navigation history entry is navigated back to, and the method of the custom state is called, and the state is applied to the content. 3. 之前的内容将导航到前进导航历史记录中。The previous content is navigated to in forward navigation history. 4. 导航历史记录项将向后导航到，但自上次导航到它所关联的导航历史记录项后，自定义状态尚未保留。The navigation history entry is navigated back to, but the custom state has not been retained since the last time the navigation history entry it was associated with was navigated to. 这是默认行为，因为在将其添加到导航历史记录后，最初记录在自定义状态的状态可能会发生更改。This is the default behavior because the state that is initially recorded in custom state may change after it was added to navigation history. 如果在导航历史记录中的条目导航到之前，将自定义状态对象向后导航到并且应用其状态，则在某些方面的状态发生更改之前，状态的更改无法反映在自定义状态对象中。If the custom state object is navigated back to and its state is applied, before some aspect about the state changes before the entry in navigation history is navigated to, the change in state cannot be reflected in the custom state object. 而且， 不能显式调用来添加一个反映状态更改的新的自定义状态对象。Furthermore, can't be explicitly called to add a new custom state object that reflects the state changes. 因此，为了确保特定导航的当前状态始终存储在导航历史记录中， 会调用。Consequently, to ensure the current state for a particular navigation is always stored in navigation history, is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在自定义内容状态下存储信息时，不能存储对要记住其状态的页的实例的任何引用。When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state. 这会阻止 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 释放页面实例，并破坏默认导航历史记录行为的目的。This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior. 如果必须这样做，则可以考虑 改用。If you must do this, you might consider using instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState GetContentState() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个要与导航历史记录中的内容关联的自定义状态类的实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of a custom state class that is to be associated with content in navigation history.

returns.span: 一个要与导航历史记录中的内容关联的自定义 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of a custom class that is to be associated with content in navigation history.
